text: ya 'ayuha almutaghatiy bithiabihi, qum min mudjaeika, fhdhdhir alnaas min eadhab alliha, wkhuss rabik wahdah bialtaezim waltawhid waleibadati, watahhir thiabik min alnajasat; fa'iina taharat alzzahir min tamam taharat albatina, wdum ealaa hajr al'asnam wal'awthan wa'aemal alshirk kulha, fala taqrubuha, wala tuet aletyat; kay taltamis 'akthar minha, walimirdat rabik fasbir ealaa al'awamir walnawahaya
